# Specially-styled questions

To use specially-styled questions like the ones below, place `<div>` tags around them like so: 

```
<div> class="question">

1. Your first question here.
2. You second question here.

</div>
```

<div class="question">
1. Your first question here.

2. You second question here.
</div>
